description:
The CEO of http://anidb.net/ch132072 [Grassley Defense Systems], one of the http://anidb.net/ch132088 [group]`s three branches. He is an aged and wise manager, who has brought his adopted son http://anidb.net/ch124443 [Shaddiq] into the company.
Source: Official page
name: Sarius Zenelli
